mapper.select:
SELECT stores_id FROM fg_order_extra
consumer_id = #{consumer_id} AND order_id = #{order_id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE beike_mall_order SET
modified_date = SYSDATE(),
status = #{status},
settle_status = #{settle_status},
delivery_address = #{delivery_address},
logistics = #{logistics},
data_source = #{data_source},
payment_way_key = #{payment_way_key},
external_order_no = #{external_order_no},
external_buyer_name = #{external_buyer_name},
external_buyer_pay_no = #{external_buyer_pay_no},
remark = #{remark},
biz_remark = #{biz_remark},
delivery_address = #{delivery_address},
contact_person = #{contact_person},
contact_tel = #{contact_tel},
transaction_no = #{transaction_no},
redpacket_fee = #{redpacket_fee},
trade_fee = #{trade_fee},
pay_date = #{pay_date},
1=1
AND order_id=#{order_id}
AND order_type=#{order_type}
AND order_no=#{order_no}
AND modified_date=#{modified_date}
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no ,o.member_type_key ,o.member_id ,o.total_fee ,o.contact_tel ,o.channel_id ,oi.goods_id ,oi.qty FROM fg_order o inner join fg_order_item oi on o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.order_date < #{lt_date} AND o.order_date > #{gt_date} AND o.status = 'processing' AND oi.sku_id is null

SELECT o.order_no ,o.member_type_key ,o.member_id ,o.total_fee ,o.contact_tel ,oi.goods_id ,oi.goods_code ,oi.qty ,oi.sku_id FROM fg_order o inner join fg_order_item oi on o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.order_date < #{lt_date} AND o.order_date > #{gt_date} AND o.status = 'processing' AND oi.sku_id is not null
mapper.update: UPDATE fg_order SET modified_date = SYSDATE(),status ='cancelled',biz_remark='超时未确定,新自营订单自动取消',remark='超时未确定,新自营订单自动取消' WHERE order_date < #{lt_date} AND order_date > #{gt_date} AND status ='processing' AND flags = '1'

UPDATE fg_order SET modified_date = SYSDATE(),status ='cancelled',biz_remark='超时未确定,订单自动取消',remark='超时未确定,订单自动取消' WHERE order_date < #{lt_date} AND order_date > #{gt_date} AND status ='processing' AND (flags is NULL OR flags = '0')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fg_order_log(log_id, category, order_no, tracked_date, event) VALUES(#{log_id}, #{category}, #{order_no}, #{tracked_date}, #{event})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no,o.category,o.tracked_date,o.event FROM fg_order_log o WHERE o.order_no = #{order_no}

SELECT stores_id, nor_amount + IFNULL(amount,0) AS sum_amount FROM (SELECT sum(amount) AS nor_amount, stores_id FROM oddb.fg_order_commission WHERE commision_status IN ('revoke', 'normal') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(), modified_date) > 13 GROUP BY stores_id ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT sum(amount) AS amount, stores_id AS nor_stores_id FROM oddb.fg_order_commission WHERE commision_status = 'transmatic' GROUP BY stores_id ) b ON a.stores_id = b.nor_stores_id
mapper.update:
UPDATE fg_order_commission SET
modified_date = SYSDATE(), amount = -amount,
commision_status = #{commision_status},
remark = #{remark},
order_id=#{order_id} AND member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(o.amount) FROM fg_order_commission o
1=1
AND o.stores_id = #{stores_id}
AND o.commision_status in ('normal','revoke')

SELECT SUM(o.amount) FROM fg_order_commission o
1=1
AND o.stores_id = #{stores_id}
AND o.commision_status IN ('revoke', 'normal') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(), modified_date) <= 13

SELECT o.member_id, o.member_phone FROM fg_order_commission o
1=1
AND o.stores_id = #{stores_id}
AND o.member_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY o.member_id

SELECT o.commission_id ,o.order_id ,o.member_id ,o.stores_id ,o.member_phone ,o.amount ,o.commision_status ,o.created_time ,o.modified_date ,o.remark ,(oi.sale_fee * oi.qty) AS sale_fee FROM fg_order_commission o inner join fg_order oi on oi.order_no = o.order_id
1=1
AND o.stores_id = #{stores_id}
AND o.commision_status IN ('revoke', 'normal') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(), o.modified_date) <= 13 ORDER BY o.created_time DESC
SELECT beike_credit as beikeCredit, member_id as memberId FROM beike_mall_order WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM beike_mall_order
member_id = #{member_id}

SELECT order_no, desc1, member_id, member_type_key, member_info, member_mobile, item_num, payment_way_key, sale_fee, vip_fee, beike_credit, actual_price, contact_tel, contact_person, STATUS, created_date, modified_date, delivery_address, order_date, delivery_fee, data_source, remark FROM beike_mall_order
AND order_no = #{order_no}

SELECT m.coupons_id, COUNT(*) count FROM oddb.beike_mall_order b, oddb.beike_mall_order_coupons m WHERE b.order_no = m.order_no AND b.`status` in ('WAIT_SELLER_SEND_GOODS','WAIT_BUYER_CONFIRM_GOODS','TRADE_FINISHED') AND member_id = #{member_id} AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(m.created_date) GROUP BY m.coupons_id UNION SELECT m.coupons_id, COUNT(*) count FROM oddb.hongbao_order b, oddb.hongbao_order_coupons m WHERE b.order_no = m.order_no AND b.`status` in ('WAIT_SELLER_SEND_GOODS','WAIT_BUYER_CONFIRM_GOODS','TRADE_FINISHED') AND member_id = #{member_id} AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(m.created_date) GROUP BY m.coupons_id
